lines.text: Let's put the women and children to bed and go lookin' for dinner!
Let's open up a can of kick ass and kill 'em all, let the paramedics sort 'em out.
Hey Bud is it true, Joe's out four fuckin' games?
Yea.
Shit, defense is gonna have to pitch shut-outs now...
[to Lattimer]
And you're gone for three? What the hell did you take that shit for?
Nobody seemed to mind when I was laying people out!
Sh*t, I bust chops too, you don't see me all fu**ed up!
Not everybody has your ability Alvin, you do what you do to play!
Well you ain't playin much now are ya?

I don't know, its the battle, the going to war with the other guys, hanging together, having our own dorm, staying in hotels the night before the games, setting ourselves apart, being different than everybody else, having a chance to be somebody, to do something that people look up to you for, your strength, your courage, not everybody can play football... were the lucky ones
This is not a football vocational school. It's an institute for higher learning.
Yeah, but when was the last time 80,000 people showed up to watch a kid do a damn chemistry experiment? Why don't you stick the bow-tie up your ass?
Hey 23, don't think I don't recognize you, you poo-butt motherfucker! Hey pay attention when I'm talking to you, nigga!
What?
You're the guy who shot my mother aren't you?
Shut up man, you know I never knew your mother.
You were trying to steal her car, you cocksucker. You didn't think I was going to find you nigga, but I got you now, nigga. I'm gonna bust your gut open and watch you die!
Darnell Jefferson, tailback.
Ray Griffen, *starting* tailback.
I know, that's why they recruited me.
Staring defense! Place at the table!
[smashes head through car window]
All you need to know is how to sign an NFL contract... period.
I know man but I promised the Rev. I'd get a degree, I don't wanna let him down.
Whatchu think nigga... you gonna be on the supreme court?
We gotta ring that bell! We gotta to ring that championship bell!
Ding motherfu**ing dong!
Yo, motherfucker! You missed that block on purpose!
Hey, *you're* the one who fumbled! Don't blame me!
This is about Autumn, isn't it?
Hey, *fuck* Autumn and *fuck* you! You just can't take a hint, can you *punk*?
[throws water in his face on "punk", and Darnell starts a fight with him]
Alright, this is Mississippi State's offensive set. Second and two on our own 24, what defensive set might we call?
Eagle Zipper Hero, unless the setback shifts into the I.
Good
[clicks to next slide]
, third and seven?
Oakie Thunder Lion.
What's your assignment?
Kill the quarterback.
[clicks to next slide]
Hit the tight end so hard his girlfriend dies.
[clicks to next slide]
Kill everybody.
Which two city-states fought in the Punic Wars?
I dunno, Detroit and Buffalo?
Yes! Yeah! STARTING DEFENSE PLACE AT THE TABLE! WOOO!
[Charges out the door and heads into the parking lot]
Looks like Joe's coming around, he should be ready for Saturday.
PLACE AT THE TABLE! YEAH! YEAH! YEAH!
[Smashes his head through a car window]
YEAH! WOO!
Jesus! You think we oughta tell coach?
Hell no, he don't wanna know about this.
WOO!
[Smashes his head through another car window]
YEAH!
Make sure you tell Lattimer that the NCAA will be testing on Saturday.

[excited with blood running down his face]
YEAH BABY! STARTING DEFENSE! WOO!
